I download Heritrix HEAD heritrix-1.3.0-200501201420-src.zip, and 
built it with Eclipse. When I run it, I get following error. The 
order.xml is from src\conf\profiles\default, and "user-agent","from" 
are set.

a dialogbox shows "Errors exist in a required project. Continue 
launch?" 

in Console window:
